channel.title: Railway.app on PSWAPNEET.com
channel.description: Recent content in Railway.app on PSWAPNEET.com

item.title: Redeployed
item.description: The blog is online again I was too lazy to do it quick The summer is almost over and I have to start being productive again. The blog was offline because of a change in my Railway.app account. It is now online again and I will update it at least twice a month to update about things that I am working on. I promise not to be too lazy. First order of business should be to update the Links and the About page, and adding some images here and there.

item.title: The blog site is deployed! How did I do it?
item.description: Instructions for Railway.app simple deployment! A quick update on how it is deployed and comments on the immediate future! I don’t need a database, so I use Hugo, and theme is called PaperMod. I would like a slightly different layout, but this will have to do for now since I need to work on other things than CSS. I will add some more graphics as soon as possible and update the About and Links page.
